title: Chinese: Get your application working correctly with Windows 7/8
sessionTitle: Chinese: Get your application working correctly with Windows 7/8
eventShortDescription: ​Windows 7 and 8 introduced a new security architecture which causes many of your applications to break. This is mainly because of UAC, Virtualization, WRP protection, Session 0 and x64 compatibility issues. This session will help you understand all of these major issues and get your applications working correctly on Windows 7/8.
